BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the waiver of public employee organizations’ rights when submitting grievances to arbitration under the New York city collective bargaining law.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Waiver of public employee organizations’ rights when submitting grievances to arbitration under the NYC collective bargaining law.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Mayors veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 658-A, in relation to the waiver of public employee organizations’ rights when submitting grievances to arbitration under the New York city collective bargaining law.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Waiver of public employee organizations’ rights when submitting grievances to arbitration under the NYC collective bargaining law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the waiver of public employee organizations’ rights when submitting grievances to arbitration under the New York city collective bargaining law.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Waiver of public employee organizations’ rights when submitting grievances to arbitration under the NYC collective bargaining law.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Mayors veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 658-A, in relation to the waiver of public employee organizations’ rights when submitting grievances to arbitration under the New York city collective bargaining law.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be Filed by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Waiver of public employee organizations’ rights when submitting grievances to arbitration under the NYC collective bargaining law.
